BuildingInfo.Civilopedia: [TAB]Museums are standing testaments to the labor of the people. Each is a special place where artists, not gods, are praised for the beauty of their creations. Immigrants travel across the world to visit them, and adventurers come in hopes they may one day be depicted.
BuildingInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Increases the chance that units born in this city will have a random race.

[ICON_BULLET]A City with a Merchant District increases the chance to discover new land Resources by 20% in your whole Empire! Build a Merchant District in your Capital to receive a Bazaar of Mammon for free.
Build a Sage District in your Capital to receive a Great Library for free.
Build a Noble District in your Capital to receive a Grand Menagerie for free.

The Luxury District further specializes your Merchants District. It will now produce twice as many bonus resources, so a goldmine provides two Gold Bonus Resources instead of one. Additionally it will grant access to a random Luxury Bonus Resource
The Foreign Trade District further specializes your Merchants District. Use it if your Civilization can have more Trade Routes with other Civilizations.
The Warehouse District further specializes your Merchants District. Cities with a Warehouse District can produce far more Resources
The Warrior District further specializes your Noble District. Use it in a City with high Production
The Bard District further specializes your Noble District. Use it when you want to achieve a Cultural Victory
The Bard Corner further specializes your Noble District. Use it when you want to achieve a Cultural Victory
The Temple District further specializes your Noble District. A City with it will provide a lot of Faith.
Automatically placed in your Capital if you only have one City

BuildingInfo.Civilopedia: The Guild of Fighters is an Organization that aims to perfect physical combat technics.
The Assassin's Guild for the Svartalfar is focused on perfecting the art of reconnaissance.

BuildingInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Converts all Forest and Jungle near the City to Ancient Forest

[ICON_BULLET]A City with a Merchant Quarter produces twice as many Bonus Resources, so a Goldmine provides two Gold Bonus Resources instead of one. The chance to discover new Resources is increased by 20% in your whole Empire! Kuriotate cities are large enough to accomodate all three quarters.
Kuriotate cities are large enough to accomodate all three quarters.
Kuriotate cities are large enough to accomodate all three quarters.
